thread.title: Stephen Colbert reveals how Ben Carson is like the Grinch
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert reveals how Ben Carson is like the Grinch

author: Oliver Gettell
title: Stephen Colbert reveals how Ben Carson is like the Grinch

organizations.name: dept. of housing and urban development

text:
Email CBS 
Leave it to Stephen Colbert to illuminate how Ben Carson — the former neurosurgeon and President Trump’s pick for secretary of housing and urban development — is like the Grinch. 
In a preview of Tuesday night’s episode of The Late Show , Colbert mocks Trump’s recent remark that Carson will find “the true meaning of HUD as its secretary.” 
“Yes, I believe Ben Carson will find the true meaning of HUD,” Colbert says blissfully, “just like in the beloved children’s story How the Grinch Stole Housing .” 
Colbert also cracks wise about Trump’s boast that he “really started something” by hiring Carson. As Colbert sees things, “It is the greatest achievement for African-Americans since … about four weeks ago when we had a black president.” Tonight! Trump believes he 'really started something' by hiring Dr. Ben Carson to lead the Dept. of Housing and Urban Development. #LSSC pic.twitter.com/RKjT2RHwra 
— The Late Show (@colbertlateshow) February 22, 2017 
The Late Show airs weeknights at 11:35 p.m. ET on CBS. Watch the clip above. Show Full Article
